item.title: Building Packages with Ian
item.description: Overview Ian is a very useful tool that facilitates the task of builiding and uploading packages to a repository. Building packages in debian could be a very annoying task, thanks to Ian, you can build your package barely with a few commands. Some of the mos relevant commandas that we are going to use are ian create, ian build and ian upload. In this recipe the focus will be put in how to build a package, at the end of the recipe a link you can find a link to a recipe that explain how tu upload a package to the arco repository.
